alert.note: Alert for Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 12:19PM EDT until July 17 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Pemigewasset River At Woodstock affecting Grafton County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pemigewasset River at Woodstock. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Route 175 floods to a depth of 1 foot at Cox Farm Road in Woodstock. Campgrounds along the river also flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:46 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 11.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
